title: The illustrious wife: viz. that excellent poem, Sir Thomas Overburie's wife illustrated by Giles Oldisworth, nephew to the same Sir T.O.
author: Oldisworth, Giles, 1619-1678.
notes: Based on: Overbury, Sir Thomas.  Sir Thomas Overburie his wife.
Appears as Wing O253 at reel 1766:26 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
